About Me
Hi, I'm Vimarsh. I am a 16-year-old electronics enthusiast from Ahmedabad, . My goal is to create technology that aims towards sustainability. I am fascinated by technology and love finding ways in which it can benefit society. I am fond of Indian Mythology and love helping the society.
